info.description:
Best of British
This luxury sofa combines the best of classic British good looks with heritage-feel fabrics and autumnal colours. Made here in the UK.

Ultimate Comfort
Made for relaxing, with foam seat filling and a medium-soft sit. In herringbone wool tweed with accent piping - cushions included.

whybuy.Best of British: This luxury sofa combines the best of classic British good looks with heritage-feel fabrics and autumnal colours. Made here in the UK.

whybuy.Ultimate Comfort: Made for relaxing, with foam seat filling and a medium-soft sit. In herringbone wool tweed with accent piping - cushions included.

Product Details.Suspension: Seat - zig zag springs. Back - webbing

Product Details.Fabric: Main - 100% herringbone wool tweed - green. Piping - 65% cotton, 35% linen - rust

Product Details.Care: Removable seat, back and bolster cushion covers - professional care only

info.name: Wolseley 2 Seater Sofa in wool tweed
